title: Russian tennis stars speak out against war
description: Two top-10 Russian tennis stars, including world No. 1 Daniil Medvedev, have addressed their country's invasion of Ukraine this week.

title: Soldiers fire warning shots to control crowd at Ukraine train station
description: Ukrainian guards are heard firing warning shots to control the crowds of people desperately attempting to flee the capital by train.

title: NATO's defensive measure in response to Russia a historic first
description: For the first time ever, the NATO Response Force has been activated as a defensive measure in response to Russia's ongoing invasion of Ukraine.

title: Wreckage of convoy seen on the way to Ukraine capital
description: CNN's Clarissa Ward describes her journey into Kyiv where she saw a damaged Ukrainian military convoy and civil defense volunteers anticipating the arrival of Russian troops into the Ukrainian capital.

title: Trump Jr.'s girlfriend, Kimberly Guilfoyle, to be subpoenaed after backing out of meeting with 1/6 panel
description: Kimberly Guilfoyle is currently being interviewed by the House select committee investigating the January 6 Capitol Hill riot, according to a source familiar with the deposition.

title: Foot Locker's stock tumbles 35% because Nike wants to go on its own
description: Foot Locker's stock tumbled 35% Friday after the shoe store predicted sales and profit would fall sharply this year. The culprit: Nike.

title: Biden nominates Ketanji Brown Jackson in historic Supreme Court first
Elon Musk and brother reportedly face insider trading probe
description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk and his brother are under investigation by the Securities and Exchange Commission for possibly violating insider trading rules, according to media reports.

title: UEFA moves Champions League Final from St. Petersburg as sporting world reacts to Russian invasion of Ukraine
description: UEFA announced that this year's Champions League Final will no longer take place in St. Petersburg following an extraordinary meeting of the governing body's Executive Committee on Friday.

title: Making -- and muddling -- the case for mask and vaccine mandates
A birthday to remember: Four Ukrainians who won't forget February 24, 2022
description: Ukrainians will never forget the events of February 24, 2022. But for some, birthdays in years to come will be especially poignant and tinged with memories of a traumatic day.

title: Why this Ukrainian citizen says Russia's long-term goals won't work
description: Journalist Terrell Jermaine Starr is on the ground in Kyiv, Ukraine, speaking with CNN alongside a civilian who has taken up arms to defend the capital against Russian forces.

title: The Black homeownership rate is now lower than it was a decade ago
description: Even as home prices have skyrocketed during the pandemic, homeownership continues to grow. But the rate of home buying has not increased at the same pace for all Americans, according to a new report from the National Association of Realtors.

title: Signs of mental health issues in children can vary greatly depending on age. Here's how to spot them
description: The Covid-19 pandemic has had a devastating impact around the world, causing millions of deaths and leading to many more people becoming severely ill and losing loved ones. It also has led to many mental health impacts, including on children and adolescents.

title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas to Rosie O'Donnell: 'Google my name'
description: It sounds like Priyanka Chopra Jonas didn't much appreciate Rosie O'Donnell referring to her as "the Chopra wife."

title: Cap worn by Amelia Earhart on historic flight could sell for 'well beyond' estimate
description: A leather cap once owned by Amelia Earhart could fetch at least $80,000 as it goes under the hammer this weekend.

title: Monster 92-foot eagle putt to win tournament is 'No. 1' moment in golf career, says Harold Varner III
description: Harold Varner III's rise through golf has been a steady one.

title: What it's like aboard the Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser at Disney World
description: The gentle purr of the engine hums as planets, spaceships and asteroids pass by in the surrounding windows.

title: British Airways cancels Moscow flights as Russia retaliates over Aeroflot ban
description: British Airways has suspended its flights to Moscow after Russia banned all UK carriers from its airspace.

title: Couple moves up wedding to tie knot during Russian wedding
description: After Russia invaded Ukraine in the early morning hours, Ukrainians headed out to get basic supplies, flee the country and get married.

title: Boxing legends the Klitschko brothers vow to fight for Ukraine
description: Former heavyweight boxing champion Vitali Klitschko said he would take up arms alongside his brother and fellow Hall of Famer Wladimir Klitschko to fight in what is a "bloody war" following Russia's invasion of their country, Ukraine.

title: Drawbridge opens while driver is still on it
description: A driver in Florida got stuck when a drawbridge opened while they were still on it.

title: These African heritage sites are under threat from rising seas, but there's still time to save them
description: On the shores of North Africa, ancient cities have stood for millennia. The columns of Carthage, in modern-day Tunisia, are a reminder of the once bustling Phoenician and Roman port, and along the coast in what's now Libya, lie the majestic ruins of Sabratha's Roman amphitheater close -- perhaps too close -- to the sea.

title: A380 superjumbo to be fitted with experimental engine
description: Airbus just moved one step closer to launching the world's first zero-emission commercial aircraft by 2035.

title: Shanghai restaurant named as record breaker
description: It's official, there's a new "world's highest restaurant in a building."

title: Museum of the Future opens its doors to the world
description: Dubai's latest attraction aims to showcase what the next 50 years could look like for the United Arab Emirates and beyond.

title: Video shows explosion after fighter jet shot down, Ukrainian official says
description: A Ukrainian Sukhoi Su-27 fighter jet was shot down over Kyiv early Friday, Ukrainian Deputy Interior Minister Evgeny Yenin tells CNN's Matthew Chance.

title: Soldiers' defiant last words as Russian warship targets Snake Island
Putin has launched an invasion. These Russian citizens don't agree
description: As Russian troops invade Ukraine, many Russian citizens are protesting against the attack and are being arrested as a result. CNN's Nic Robertson reports from Moscow.

title: Thousands flee air strikes as fighting erupts in Myanmar
description: Myanmar's military deployed ground troops and launched air and artillery strikes against rebel forces in the country's east, witnesses, local media and an aid group said on Thursday, prompting thousands of people to flee.

title: Taiwan warns Chinese aircraft in its air defense zone
description: Taiwan's air force scrambled again on Thursday to warn away nine Chinese aircraft that entered its air defense identification zone, Taiwan's Defense Ministry said, on the same day that Russia invaded Ukraine, a crisis being watched closely in Taipei.

title: Reality Check: This is why sociopaths too often succeed
description: Political scientist & ﻿author Brian Klaas says 'strongmen' leaders like Vladimir Putin activate a template in the human brain, causing many to gravitate toward them. Klaas also tells Reality Check's John Avlon about his research into sociopaths - how they are naturally drawn to power and all too often, succeed in getting it.
